spellsword.description: Hot-blooded and decisive. A natural fighter with a broad affinity for the elements. This breed has a tendency to bite off more than they can chew.

salamander.description: Semi-aquatic. Thrives in marshes. Slimy and disease-ridden, but with a keen affinity for the healing arts.

shaman.description: A disciplined healer who can control earth and plant. Can take a hit and deal one out, too.
